column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Parking lot is tiny and can be a pain to find one in there
column2: especially on a Saturday morning. If all else fails
column3: search for street parking. As far as the lines to order
column4: Saturday peak morning times are usually packed. I have seen the line go almost out the door but it usually moves quickly. Late afternoon
column6: is when it starts quieting down.
